title: Authors and Citation
Authors and Citation
text: Durrani U (2022). daqr: Read extract driving data driving simulator Data AcQuisition files. R package version 0.1.0, https://durraniu.github.io/daqr/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {daqr: Read and extract driving data from driving simulator Data AcQuisition files},   author = {Umair Durrani},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://durraniu.github.io/daqr/}, }

what: Read and extract driving data from driving simulator Data AcQuisition files
title: Read and extract driving data from driving simulator Data AcQuisition files
text: daqr provides functions work Data AcQuisition (DAQ) files generated minisim driving simulator. daqr, can convert daq file hdf5 type, get useful driving variables directly R. Behind scenes, daqr uses undaqTools python package Roger Lew.

title: Read and extract driving data from driving simulator Data AcQuisition files
text: can install development version daqr GitHub :

title: Read and extract driving data from driving simulator Data AcQuisition files
text: need python 2.7 packages installed use daqr. can get python packages one two ways discussed .

title: Read and extract driving data from driving simulator Data AcQuisition files
text: already python 2.7 installed, make sure following packages install : scipy numpy matplotlib h5py nose sphinx numpydoc undaqTools , R, can use reticulate specify installation python start using daqr:

title: Read and extract driving data from driving simulator Data AcQuisition files
text: start scratch, use reticulate package R install python, create virtual environment, install dependencies : Now ready use daqr.
code: # install.packages("reticulate") library(reticulate)  path_to_python <- install_python(version="2.7.18") virtualenv_create("r-reticulate", python = path_to_python)   py_install(packages = c("scipy", "numpy", "matplotlib", "h5py",                         "nose", "sphinx", "numpydoc", "undaqTools"),            python_version = "2.7.18",            envname = "r-reticulate")

what: Converting a daq file to hdf5:
title: Read and extract driving data from driving simulator Data AcQuisition files
text: function read_daq_and_save_to_hdf5 read daq file save hdf5 format location using file name.
code: library(daqr) library(reticulate)  ## Specify the environment to use use_virtualenv("r-reticulate")  read_daq_and_save_to_hdf5("path/to/daq/file.daq")

title: Read and extract driving data from driving simulator Data AcQuisition files
text: can get several variables driving data using function read_driver_data. takes two arguments file_name metric. file_name parameter can daq file hdf5 file. units variables resulting dataframe depends metric. TRUE, units metric, FALSE, units imperial.
code: library(daqr) library(reticulate)  ## Specify the environment to use use_virtualenv("r-reticulate")  # Get driving data from daq file read_driver_data("path/to/daq/file.daq")  # Get driving data from previously saved hdf5 file read_driver_data("path/to/hdf5/file.hdf5")
